Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.assertions

Class DiagnosticAssert

java.lang.Object
org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<DiagnosticAssert,TraceDiagnostic<? extends JavaFileObject>>
io.github.ascopes.jct.assertions.DiagnosticAssert
All Implemented Interfaces:
Assert<DiagnosticAssert,TraceDiagnostic<? extends JavaFileObject>>, Descriptable<DiagnosticAssert>, ExtensionPoints<DiagnosticAssert,TraceDiagnostic<? extends JavaFileObject>>
@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) public final class DiagnosticAssert extends AbstractAssert<DiagnosticAssert,TraceDiagnostic<? extends JavaFileObject>>
Assertions for an individual trace diagnostic.
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

      Returns:
      the assertions for the thread name.

    • stackTrace

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true) public StackTraceAssert stackTrace()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      I have put up a pull request for AssertJ to support this functionality in AssertJ Core. Once this is merged, this return type will be changed to use the AssertJ implementation.
      Get assertions for the stack trace of the location the diagnostic was reported to.
      Returns:
      the assertions for the stack trace.
